items.text: full on leg-stump again, and clips it into the gap. Square-leg has to run to his right to clean up
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, 2 runs

items.preText: Tanvir: "It's a great move to bring back Fizz on attack as Zimbabwe is trying ti accelerate the run rate & tigers can take full control if they can pick a couple of quick wickets here. "
items.text: fuller length, slanting across the batsman, pushed to mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, no run

items.text: slower ball, ends up as a full toss, but he can't get hold of it. pats it back tamely and the bowler fields
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, no run

items.preText: Masum Billah: "Not underestimate ZIM but 275 from this position will be very high tsk rather a optimistic call" - fair point, there are 8 overs left, they need to hit out to get there
items.text: punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: smashed steps down the track and muscles it over long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, SIX runs

items.text: down the track again, but he spotted him and pulled the length back. Can only pat it to short midwicket
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: driven off the front foot, but can't get past cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: cleverly bowled. The batsman made to come down, but the bowler wasn't fooled, kept it full and in the blockhole
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: comes down again but gets an outside edge that trickles into the offside excellent comeback by the bowler after being hit for six
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, tucked away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, 1 run

items.text: driven sweetly off the front foot, but straight to the man at cover, who makes a good tumbling save
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: slower ball sent over the long-off he saw it early, came on the front foot and swung through for much needed runs
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, SIX runs

items.text: clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: driven straight back superbly timed, he punched it back with force, straight past Mortaza
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball. Didn't pick it up, tried to hit the short delivery over midwicket, but got a big inside edge that rolls towards point off the thigh pad
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, straying on the pads, clipped to the right of wide long-on. Good running gives them two
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Moor, 2 runs

items.preText: Arman: "Mashrafee has been expensive in death overs all through his career.I dont understand why he keeps bringing himself back in death overs everytime."
items.text: smashed stood in his crease and bludgeoned it straight past the bowler and into the fence with a flat bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Moor, FOUR runs

items.text: low full toss, was a tad late on it, driven into the covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Moor, no run

items.text: waited for it, and tried to cut it fine, but didn't get it quite right. Ends up pushing it to point for a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Moor, 1 run

items.text: full toss, whipped down to fine leg, where the man running to his right had to put in a sliding save
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball, waits for it and turns it into the vacant midwicket area
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.preText: Tanveer khan: "Batting will be easier under the lights and dew will be a factor for Zim bowlers, reason to bowl first for BD. "
items.text: slower ball, he clips it down to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.preText: Istiak: "Mashrafe is not a death bowler, I am not sure why he always try to come back after 40th over. He is not learning as a captain, disappointing "
items.text: dropped short ball that needed to be put away. He swung from the stumps and pulled it to fine leg. Mithun at fine leg was standing inside, ran back and got both hands to the ball, but let it pop out
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, 1 run

items.text: gets his revenge immediately slower ball outside off, drawing the poke. Mushfiqur had no trouble collecting the thin edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, OUT

dismissal.text: Sikandar Raza c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 49 (61b 3x4 2x6) SR: 80.32

items.preText: Elton Chigumbura can hit them big. Zimbabwe will need a few to get to a safe-looking total
items.text: was going for the yorker, didn't quite get it. Driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chigumbura, no run
